tweets.text:
My odour survey last night at 3.10am on the Galingale. What people are living with isn't fair or right, and clearly further capping off is required: the whole site if necessary @EnvAgencyMids #StopTheStink

https://t.co/g4i7E6iUZK

@RichmondRector @LBRUT exactly the wrong time to be destroying beautiful bee-friendly graveyard habitat. Why its the prime of spring! @EnvAgency @metpoliceuk @ClarenceHouse is this a @churchofengland decision not to intervene or a C of E dictat? https://t.co/U6cI85vWBU

tweets.text: Our officers are supporting @nottsfire and other agencies in the response to this incident. We are monitoring any pollution impacts from the fire. https://t.co/UH7GI37qpN

@hayulls @Lucy_Lapwing @LGSpace @Buzz_dont_tweet @DandelionAppre1 @Love_plants @wildflower_hour @WildFlowerSoc @BiodiversitySoS @MeadowInGarden @DaveGoulson @RewildingB A too common sight around #Banbury and in a play area too. Children should be exposed to Daisies and Dandelions not toxic herbicides @banburyfm @banburynews @Cherwellcouncil @TownEvents @EnvAgency https://t.co/trPXmKhNrN

A further response from Government on the petition on banning sewage discharges. It goes much further than the previous rather misguided response. This is positive, while we do not agree with all new statement says, it does go further towards stopping this unacceptable practice. https://t.co/vnDK6uqdjJ

tweets.text:
Via the NEW Diglis fish pass, twaite shad can now swim past #Worcester on their #SevernShadRun for the first time in nearly 180yrs! üéâüêüüéâ 
Please watch & share our video! #FollowTheShad #FishMigration @CanalRiverTrust @severnrivers @EnvAgencyMids @HeritageFundM_E @LIFEprogramme https://t.co/kzh7NFPljc

@Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe Glad Aaron has smelt how bad it is night after night. No, @PHE_uk it‚Äôs not transient symptoms when it‚Äôs happening everyday! Amazingly it took @EnvAgencyMids years to actually acknowledge the smell. Yeh,they couldn‚Äôt even smell it on the weekend of 2000 complaints üëÉ #stopthestink

@ian_blewett @PJennings88 @RiverChess @EnvAgency Central gov funding cuts mean that the bean counters call the shots. Time is allocated to industries paying largest permit fees, not risk. There is no pollution prevention. Pollution investigation and enforcement is expensive and only some of the EA costs can be recovered.

7.5.21- woke at 3.30am having contractions again, and to find @AaronBell4NUL had recently been live on his way back from keele! House is still full of gas even now as the purifier couldn‚Äôt keep up it was that bad! #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @PHE_uk

@SOPH_C_ And yet @EnvAgencyMids are still allowing the tipping of waste. This is a letter sent by @StaffordshireCC to all parents via schools telling them that there is categorically no long term health problems from the ‚Äòodour‚Äô. Not true. Letter vs research. üëá#stopthestink https://t.co/SVCoLnmyW7

Having symptoms day in day out is hell, we have no end in sight we feel hopeless prisoner in our homes that @RedIndustries2 have turned into gas chambers @EnvAgency letting it carry on we can‚Äôt take anymore give us our lives back #StopTheStink @Cap_it_off #fridaymorning https://t.co/m15jqoRGQN

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids Smells bad in Newcastle Town Centre too this morning.
@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids It needs to stop accepting rubbish now, not in 2026, it all needs capping off now and we need to get better at recycling.
@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids Can I say the if necessary isn't needed , the whole site needs closing as red can't be trusted .

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids If @EnvAgencyMids had not ignored residents complaints for so long it would not have got this bad.They are not fit for purpose and a independent enquiry needs to happen to find out why the issues at Walley‚Äôs Quarry was ignored for so many months/years @ClareDinnisEA #stopthestink

tweets.text: Nothing to see here eh @EnvAgencyMids & @RedIndustries2? Just a damning letter describing how the toxic gases from Walley‚Äôs Quarry affect Staffordshire‚Äôs Fire and Rescue Service. I‚Äôd put that on the top of any risk registers you have (if you have any of course). #stopthestink https://t.co/avCr11feZn

So we had the urgency to cap off cell 1 thats in yellow but now the problem is in 3 and 4 from hot spot ground surveys, strange looking at the old picture where the real problem is coming from, cap it all off now perhaps? https://t.co/atDDyHO8ku

Did you see our short film celebrating Diglis fish pass? Twaite shad can now swim up-river on their #SevernShadRun for the 1st time in nearly 180yrs!

Look at what Marcus Rashford did for free school meals. He made a huge impact. You need a big voice to shout loudly so that you can get the basic human right of clean air.

@ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA to issue any communication re the landfill capping situation (deadline was last Friday) is utterly unforgivable given they are painfully aware that the community is at the end of its tether. @DefraGovUK #stopthestink
